```{r}
 system("dot -Tps graph1.gv -o graph1.ps") # ps

system("dot -Tpng graph1.gv -o graph1.png") # png

 system("dot -Tsvg graph1.gv -o graph1.svg")

 system("dot -Tdot graph1.gv -o graph1.txt") # programme en mode texte
```
